name: Mass
description: Composition for choir, with or without instrumental accompaniment, that sets to music text from the liturgy of the Eucharist, principally from the Latin rites of the Roman Catholic Church.

children.name: Requiem
children.description: Musical setting commemorating the deceased with text usually derived from the Roman Catholic mass of the dead.
